comment.author: 26221836@N03
comment._content: I think this is really different type of picture.  It features 2 women boxing.  Back then, people didn't allow woman to box and this picture is really revolutionary.

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: A vaudeville act. See www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2989424855/ for a picture of them wrestling.
